articles.description: During Friday's episode, the pair of siblings, from Blackpool, were seen drinking out of a vast array of novelty mugs - including a sloth, wool, and even a burger
articles.content:
A pair of Gogglebox favourites have been praised by viewers of the Channel 4 show after fans spotted a brilliant detail.
Those watching the Channel 4 favourite as it returned to our screens on Frida… [+1369 chars]
